channel.title: A question about World objects
channel.description:
Does it happen to be possible to delete world objects client-sided, such as a tree, or stump? What I am wondering this for is because as of now, they're only deleted server sided.
Why does this bother me? Any time you travel/teleport/login to an area with deleted objects, they load for a fraction of a second until the server communicates with them not to load. It just seems unprofessional looking to me, especially if I want to have a semi-successful server. Also, if deleting objects is possible, that means creating them through the client would be possible as well. Correct?
Any help/suggestions is/are very welcome. Thanks for your time!

item.title: A question about World objects
item.dc:creator: @jummppy jummppy
item.description:
@jummppy wrote:

umm i would imagine you could lol but u gotta try cause i have no clue
